title: BRIEF-Azumah Resources Says To Pay Castle Minerals For Acquisition Of Julie West Prospecting Licence
text:
BRIEF-Azumah Resources Says To Pay Castle Minerals For Acquisition Of Julie West Prospecting Licence

Stock Markets 43 minutes ago (Oct 23, 2019 19:56)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Azumah Resources Says To Pay Castle Minerals For Acquisition Of Julie West Prospecting Licence Oct 23 (Reuters) - Azumah Resources Ltd : * AGREED TO PAY CASTLE MINERALS FINAL $250,000 CASH COMPONENT REGARDING ACQUISITION OF JULIE WEST PROSPECTING LICENCE

BRIEF-Azumah Resources Says To Pay Castle Minerals For Acquisition Of Julie West Prospecting Licence
